description: Source files for the AppGateway plugin, including main implementation, responder, resolver, and module definitions.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class for handling the App Gateway plugin functionalities.

classes.name: AppGatewayImplementation
classes.description: Implementation class for the App Gateway logic.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Handles responder functionalities for the App Gateway.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Class responsible for resolving dependencies or components in the plugin.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Module class representing the plugin module structure.

methods.name: AppGatewayImplementation::execute
methods.description: Executes the core logic of the implementation.

methods.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation::respond
methods.description: Handles responses in the responder implementation.

methods.name: Resolver::resolveComponent
methods.description: Resolves and returns a component or dependency.

methods.name: Module::register
methods.description: Registers the module within the plugin framework.
